EmailTemplate.subject: LIVING GUIDELINES? Missed our Webinar? Need to catch up at ISPOR?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LIVING GUIDELINES? Missed our Webinar? Need to catch up at ISPOR?
Did you miss the DRE-GROWTH Webinar? A presentation and discussion by Mike Cheung, Chief Science Officer, KDIGO, and Sandra Zelman Lewis, PhD, Chief Guidelines Officer, Doctor Evidence, co-authors of the recent publication: “ Recommendations for kidney disease guideline updating: a report by the KDIGO Methods Committee” Click here for the archived webinar!
MEET WITH OUR TEAM AT ISPOR
SCHEDULE A ONE-ON-ONE MEETING WITH A MEMBER OF OUR TEAM
